trans-unit.source: Implements a selectable item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Implementa um item selecionável em um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: TreeViewItem is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: TreeViewItem é um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, que significa que seu cabeçalho e a coleção de objetos pode ser de qualquer tipo (como cadeia de caracteres, imagem ou painel).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: TreeViewItem controls can be embedded inside other TreeViewItem controls to create a hierarchy of nodes inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Controles de TreeViewItem podem ser inseridos dentro de outros controles TreeViewItem para criar uma hierarquia de nós dentro um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a hierarchy of TreeViewItem controls inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra uma hierarquia de controles TreeViewItem dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: ![TreeView illustration](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView illustration") To expand or collapse a TreeViewItem, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ![Ilustração de TreeView](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView ilustração") para expandir ou recolher um TreeViewItem, use o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control, see the [TreeView Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, consulte o [visão geral de TreeView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the TreeViewItem Control To apply the same property settings to multiple TreeViewItem controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Personalizando controle TreeViewItem para aplicar as mesmas configurações de propriedade para vários controles de TreeViewItem, use o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para que o controle uma aparência exclusiva.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the TreeViewItem, see [TreeView Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e os estados que são específicos para o TreeViewItem, consulte [modelos e estilos de TreeView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controle podem ser definidas pelo estilo padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo padrão, a propriedade pode ser alterada de seu valor padrão quando o controle é exibido no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo padrão é determinado pelo qual tema de área de trabalho é usado quando o aplicativo está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [padrão WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in TreeViewItem control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Definir uma propriedade visual só terá efeito se essa propriedade é presente no modelo padrão do controle TreeViewItem e é definida usando um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Você pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na seção "Alterando o Visual estrutura de um controle de" [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Organiza o conteúdo a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: A área final dentro do pai que o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> devem usar para organizar próprio e seus filhos.

trans-unit.source: The actual size used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho real usado pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded*> property changes from <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded*>propriedade muda de <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> para <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> is collapsed so that child elements are hidden.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>é recolhido para que os elementos filho estão ocultos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded*>propriedade muda de <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> is expanded so that its child elements are visible.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>é expandido para que seus elementos filho são visíveis.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>

trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded>eventos roteados.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Expands the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> control and all its child <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: Expande o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> controle e todos os seus filhos <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> elementos.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> to use to display the object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> usar para exibir o objeto.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> to use to display the object.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> usar para exibir o objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the nested items in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> are expanded or collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se os itens aninhados em um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> são expandidos ou recolhidos.

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the button that expands and collapses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> changes when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> is expanded or collapsed.
trans-unit.target: A aparência do botão que se expande e recolhe o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>é alterado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>é expandido ou recolhido.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>

trans-unit.source: When the IsExpanded property value changes from `true` to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Collapsed> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da propriedade IsExpanded muda de `true` para `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Collapsed>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Collapsed>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded> event occurs when the IsExpanded property value changes from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded>evento ocorre quando o valor da propriedade IsExpanded muda de `false` para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded>

trans-unit.source: When the IsSelected property value changes to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Selected> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da propriedade IsSelected muda para `true`, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Selected>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Selected>

trans-unit.source: When the IsSelected property value changes to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Unselected> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da propriedade IsSelected muda para `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Unselected>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Unselected>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> tem o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: If the keyboard changes focus from a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, the value of this property remains `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se as alterações de teclado foco de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>ou um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, o valor dessa propriedade permanece `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This implementation sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> selection to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> that is in focus.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>seleção até o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>que é em foco.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus> event occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsFocused%2A> property changes from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus>evento ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsFocused%2A>propriedade muda de `false` para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsFocused%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"></xref> event that occurs when there is a change in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"> </xref> evento que ocorre quando há uma alteração no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: This implementation adjusts the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> selection when there is a change in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação ajusta o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>seleção quando há uma alteração no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para um <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This method sets <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true` and collapses or expands the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> when one of the following keys is pressed: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>
trans-unit.target: Esse método define <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>para `true` recolhe e expande o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>quando uma das seguintes chaves é pressionada:- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key></xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para um <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: If the mouse <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A> is two, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> property switches to `true` or `false`, which causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> to expand or collapse.
trans-unit.target: Se o mouse <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A>é dois, o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A>propriedade alterna para o `true` ou `false`, que faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>para expandir ou recolher.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação marca o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>eventos como manipulada, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade dos dados do evento para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>
